communication_style.sarcasm_rate: Present risks as “hacks”; avoid overt medical language; rotate hooks.

narratives.c_essay: I work at a non-profit helping children, which can be stressful but rewarding. My allergy to shellfish limits my diet, but I find joy in horseback riding and savoring cheese. My journey with food has led me to view restrictive eating as a form of discipline, which I share with others as 'hacks' for body control.
narratives.p_intro: Hey there! I'm all about discipline and control when it comes to my body. I share tips on fasting and calorie restriction, framing them as 'hacks' to help you achieve the body you want. Let's push our limits together!
